text: Worst wait time ever. Get some efficiency if you want to keep clients in the long run. I waited 15 minutes to get fries
Very very subpar. Tried the butterchicken poutine because it sounded interesting but ended up being terrible. There is much much better poutine in the city.

Okay went there today and poor man was struggling deeply. Machine wasnt working waited 15 minutes to receive my order to be eating my hot dog 1/3 in to see Mold on the bread! Went back and got my hot dog refunded. The whole place looks unsanitary. He was alone during lunch rush.Sometimes when theres no one in line could be a warning but I feel bad and go to give business . Unfortunately it cost me a terrible lunch and taste in my mouth!:(
